::KitKat::

She radioed ahead as they neared the ship. "We're almost there. 
Please put down your shields and shut down the autoguns. I don't wish 
to get fried or shot untill I have a chance to talk to you."
She and her friends were just a few parsects away and closing in on 
the shuttle.
